hero.title: Connecting Europe's insurance innovators
hero.subtitle: Linking MGAs, capacity providers, distributors and service partners to share knowledge, build relationships, and improve delegated underwriting across Europe.

who_we_are.title: See and be seen
who_we_are.description: FASE raises the profile of the delegated underwriting sector and its individual members. Our members share a focus on collaboration, responsible growth, and high professional standards. Through shared insight, practical resources and an active network, we help each member build the partnerships that will sustain the growth of its business.

pan_european_events.title: Pan-European Events
pan_european_events.description: Biannual conferences bringing together MGAs, capacity providers, and service providers for networking and business development.

digital_platform.title: Digital Platform
digital_platform.description: Multi-lingual digital platform providing technical, regulatory, and risk appetite resources for MGA members.

market_intelligence.title: Market Intelligence
market_intelligence.description: Annual European market reports demonstrating MGA dynamism with accurate statistics and pan-European market insights.

industry_advocacy.title: Industry Advocacy
industry_advocacy.description: Voice for MGAs in regulatory discussions at national and pan-European levels.

education_training.title: Education & Training
education_training.description: Online education and training modules for MGA employees across various specialisms.

market_research.title: Market Research
market_research.description: Research capabilities for MGAs seeking access to new European markets and growth opportunities.

capacity_transparency.title: Capacity Transparency
capacity_transparency.description: Enhanced transparency on insurer appetite for MGA-sourced business by geography and class.

quote.text: MGAs are, in the main, small businesses. As our members look to grow, they are sometimes hampered by regulatory obstacles, data gaps, and capacity constraints. FASE can help.
quote.author: Dario Spata
quote.title: President of ASASE and FASE advisory board member

networking.title: Networking & Collaboration
networking.description: Engage with peers through forums, events, and working groups that foster practical connections and help members find solutions to common challenges.

professional_development.title: Professional Development
professional_development.description: Access targeted learning opportunities and research designed to help MGAs build expertise and leadership capability.

market_intelligence.title: Market Intelligence
market_intelligence.description: Benefit from curated data and insights that give members a clear understanding of current trends, regulatory shifts, and emerging opportunities across European markets.

standards.title: Vetting & Standards
standards.subtitle: To uphold the professionalism of the FASE community, we have established a membership protocol:

eligibility_review.title: Eligibility Review
eligibility_review.description: Confirmation of business credentials, regulatory status, and ethical track record.

standards_alignment.title: Standards Alignment
standards_alignment.description: Assessment of each applicant's alignment with recognised delegated underwriting principles.

peer_endorsement.title: Peer Endorsement
peer_endorsement.description: Consultation with our Advisory Board and existing members to ensure credibility and fit within the community.

ongoing_review.title: Ongoing Review
ongoing_review.description: Periodic reaffirmation of good standing and continued commitment to shared standards.

standards.conclusion: This process ensures FASE remains a trusted network of professionals working to raise consistency, transparency, and performance in delegated underwriting.

why_join.title: A practical network for a complex market
why_join.subtitle: Whether you're an MGA, insurer, broker, or service partner, FASE helps you stay connected to the people, information, and perspectives shaping delegated underwriting in Europe.
why_join.tagline: FASE — building a connected, informed, and responsible Delegated Underwriting community

footer.description: The Federation of European MGAs - representing the MGA community across Europe.
